title: Blaze erupts in H-9 Sunday market
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP): A fire broke out in the Sunday market, located in H-9 area on Wednesday morning.
According to the spokesman of Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) administration, the Assistant Commissioner I-9 reached on the spot to oversee the situation.
While, the fire brigade was actively working to control the blaze, with three fire engines dispatched to tackle the flames.
On the occasion, AC said that hectic efforts were underway to control the blaze and hoped fire brigade teams would extinguish the fire soon.
